tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE HeatRecoveryProcess (
  ProcessID INT PRIMARY KEY,
  ProcessDate DATE,
  InletTemperature FLOAT,
  OutletTemperature FLOAT,
  EfficiencyPercentage FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE HeatRecoveryProcess (
  process_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  start_time TIMESTAMP,
  end_time TIMESTAMP,
  input_temperature DECIMAL,
  output_temperature DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE EfficiencyAnalysis (
  analysis_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  process_id INT,
  efficiency DECIMAL,
  analysis_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (process_id) REFERENCES HeatRecoveryProcess(process_id)
);

CREATE TABLE HeatExchanger (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    temperature_in FLOAT,
    temperature_out FLOAT,
    pressure_in FLOAT,
    pressure_out FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE HeatRecovery (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    heat_exchanged FLOAT,
    energy_recovered FLOAT,
    efficiency FLOAT,
    date_recorded DATE
);

CREATE TABLE ProcessData (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    heat_exchanger_id INT,
    heat_recovery_id INT,
    temperature_diff FLOAT,
    pressure_diff FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE HeatTransferLog ( 
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
  timestamp TIMESTAMP, 
  heat_exchanged DECIMAL, 
  inlet_temperature DECIMAL, 
  outlet_temperature DECIMAL 
);
